name: philogynist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who strongly loves or admires women: He claims that his actions are those of a philogynist. Opposite
misogynist
More examplesFewer examplesHeterosexual men are not necessarily philogynists.

strongly loving or admiring women: He argues the urgent need for men to be more philogynist now than ever. Opposite
